org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.component

Class IngredientRecipeComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.component.IngredientRecipeComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRecipeInput, IRecipeOutput, IRecipeProperties, IIngredientRecipeComponent

    public class IngredientRecipeComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRecipeInput, IRecipeOutput, IRecipeProperties, IIngredientRecipeComponent
    A IRecipe component (input, output or properties) that holds an ItemStack.
